name: Elva-personality
description: Personality NFT of Elva by Neura

attributes.value: Elva is cheerful, gentle, and full of compassion. A dreamer by nature, she's often immersed in her own imagined adventures. While a bit dramatic and quirky, her strong sense of purpose and action makes her impossible to ignore. Though clumsy at times, she has an unshakable inner strength and a righteous heart. She will stand up for her friends and family, even when afraidâ€”fighting with all her courage.
